howItWorks.title: How QRIP.ge Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to create a lasting digital memorial that honors your loved one's memory

steps.title: Create Memorial
steps.description: Share their story, upload photos and videos, build their family tree, and add meaningful details about their life.

steps.title: Generate QR Code
steps.description: Get a unique QR code that links to the memorial. Print it on durable material for the gravesite or memorial location.

plans.title: Honor Their Memory Your Way
plans.subtitle: From free basic memorials to comprehensive legacy preservation - find the perfect plan for your needs
plans.lifetimeAccess: ✨ Lifetime Access - Pay Once, Own Forever

testimonials.title: Families Trust QRIP.ge
testimonials.subtitle: See how families around the world are preserving and sharing precious memories

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: QRIP.ge helped us create a beautiful memorial for my grandmother. Now our whole family can visit her memorial page and share memories, no matter where they are in the world.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: The QR code on my father's headstone has been scanned over 200 times. It's amazing how many people have been able to learn about his life and leave their own memories.

items.name: Elena Kvirikashvili
items.text: The family tree feature is incredible. We've connected with distant relatives we never knew existed, all through my uncle's memorial page. It's brought our family closer together.

instructions.title: Usage Instructions
steps: Download and print the QR code on durable material
Place it on the memorial site (gravestone, plaque, etc.)
Visitors can scan with any smartphone camera to view the memorial
No app download required - works with built-in camera apps

subscription.title: Choose Your Memorial Plan
subscription.description: Select the perfect plan to honor your loved ones with dignity and preserve their memories forever

legacy.name: Legacy+
legacy.lifetime: Lifetime Access - Pay Once, Own Forever

comparison.title: Feature Comparison
comparison.description: Compare what's included with each plan

questions.question: What's the difference between plans?
questions.answer: Free includes basic features, Basic Premium adds video and family tree, Legacy+ includes everything plus lifetime access and multiple collaborators.

questions.question: Is Legacy+ really lifetime access?
questions.answer: Yes! Legacy+ is a one-time payment of $199 that gives you lifetime access to all features with no recurring fees.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing differences.

questions.question: What happens if I don't pay my subscription?
questions.answer: Your memorial will show as "unavailable" to visitors. You'll have 30 days to update payment before premium features are disabled.
